short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gather all the data of Daraz Products at one place!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool to scrape winning product from Daraz. You can easily run this tool on any search/category page of Daraz.pk and get results for all the products on that page.

Currently These options are available in this plugin:

â¬¤ Overall Statistics:
- Average Price
- Average Reviews
- Average Rating

â¬¤ Data Columns:
- Product Name
- Seller 
- Brand 
- Product URL
- Location 
- Price
- Reviews 
- Rating 
- Free Shipping


Upcoming Options:
- Stock
- Categories
- Avg Daily Sales
- Avg Monthly Sales
- Est Monthly Revenue
- Track Product
- & Much More.. ðŸ˜€
